***IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR THOSE WHO EXPERIENCE CRASH AFTER LOGO***
When the rebellion logo comes up, hit ALT+ENTER and the screen will become smaller, and after the logo screen is over and the main menu comes up, simply hit ALT+ENTER again and the screen will become full screen again. Enjoy gaming! :)
